channel.title: Posts on krejac's notes
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on krejac's notes

item.title: Security Oriented Podcasts
item.description: The security oriented podcasts I listen to regularly are: SANS StormCasts - the quick no-nonsense daily fix. Smashing Security - the familiar weekly chat about cybercrime, hacking, and online privacy. Malicious Life - Listen to tales from the annals of cybersecurity and cyberwar from time to time. Also worth mentioning (but not yet regular on my list): Risky Business Cyber Security Sauna

item.title: Hello Friend
item.description: “Hello, friend?” That’s lame. Maybe I should give you a name… But that’s a slippery slope. You’re only in my head. We have to remember that… Shit. It’s actually happened. I’m talking to an imaginary person. â€” Mr. Robot S01E01
